title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Psychodynamics of Human Behavior, Behavior Process, Perception, Emotion, Motivation, Learning, Memory and Forgetting, Individual Differences, Intelligence and personality conflict, Adjustment and Mental Health.
